H0.text: The Forest of Arden is in which English county. Staffordshire

H1.text: The Forest of Arden is in which English county. Shropshire

H2.text: The Forest of Arden is in which English county. Cheshire

H3.text: The Forest of Arden is in which English county. Warks

A4.text: It thus included much of Warwickshire, and parts of Shropshire, Staffordshire, the West Midlands, and Worcestershire.

A5.text: Much of western Warwickshire, including the area now forming part of Coventry, Solihull and Birmingham, was covered by the ancient Forest of Arden (most of which was cut down to provide fuel for industrialisation).
